OptionText.Text: Take her out to dinner and a movie
Set up a DIY spa day at home with oils and creams I bought myself
Take her to the new museum

OptionResult.Result: %FirstName:Npc:1% loved dinner and the movie was equally as great. But wow was that restaurant expensive!
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: This was a fantastic night for %FirstName:Npc:1% and I, the classic dinner and a movie choice was perfect! And sure it hit my wallet a bit hard, but it was worth it.

OptionResult.Result: %FirstName:Npc:1% loved the idea but then had an allergic reaction to some of the oils i bought and it ruined the whole day!
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: I honestly thought this was going to be a great gift idea but %FirstName:Npc:1% was furious when she had her allergic reaction to the oils, I guess this was a risky idea!

OptionResult.Result: %FirstName:Npc:1% didn’t mind the museum but she is annoyed I picked it for us to do on her birthday.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: This ended up being quite a cheap choice and we learned a lot, but %FirstName:Npc:1% wasn’t too thrilled with the birthday gift and I think I may be in some trouble.

OptionResult.Result: At first, %FirstName:Npc:1% was annoyed but then we both ended up loving the experience and can’t wait to go back!
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: %FirstName:Npc:1% was skeptical at first but she ended up loving paintball and we’ve probably never been closer!
